request.description: It is endpoint to post the data you need to add form-data in body and send the request, also in repo i have created a data.json file for testing if needed and also i have attached some example response

response.name: post chapters

request.description: it is to fetch a single chapter by id, need to pass id as a params also to test rate limit easily send this request more than 30 times in a minute and

response.name: rate limit example
